p:
This page contains a list of software and vendors that are known to support Peppol and/or eDelivery functionality.
The list on this page is not complete.
No guarantee on anything on this page.
If you want to be included, or you are a vendor and want something changed, ping me.

ul.li: OpenPeppol: Links to Software for Peppol Implementations

p: This chapter deals with AS4 solutions only.

ul.li: AS4.NET [Open Source] - https://ec.europa.eu/digital-building-blocks/code/projects/EDELIVERY/repos/eessi-as4.net/browse - the only .NET based Open Source implementation we are aware of. Not maintained for a long time. Does not contain Peppol-specifics.
Domibus [Open Source] - https://ec.europa.eu/digital-building-blocks/wikis/display/DIGITAL/Domibus - Java based. Requires some extra package on dynamic discovery to be able to work with Peppol.
Holodeck [Open Source] - http://holodeck-b2b.org/download/ - Java based. Requires some additional Peppol package that is not free.
Oxalis [Open Source] - https://github.com/OxalisCommunity/Oxalis-AS4 - Java based. Needs to be integrated into Oxalis.
phase4 [Open Source] - https://github.com/phax/phase4 - Java based. Is a library and needs local integration.

p: This chapter deals with Service Metadata Publisher (SMP) solutions only.

ul.li: phoss SMP [Open Source] - https://github.com/phax/phoss-smp - Java based SMP solution.

p: This chapter deals with validation solutions only.

ul.li: ecosio - https://ecosio.com/en/peppol-and-xml-document-validator/ - Form based validation for many formats.
phive [Open Source] - https://github.com/phax/phive - Java based validation engine.
phive-rules [Open Source] - https://github.com/phax/phive-rules - Predefined rule sets for usage with phive.
